# UITextItemInteraction.invokeDefaultAction

**Case**

The user wants to perform the default action on the text item; for example, opening a URL.

## Declaration

```swift
case invokeDefaultAction
```

## Constants

- **UITextItemInteraction.presentActions**: The user wants to be presented with a list of actions that can be taken on the text item, such as opening the link in a different way or downloading content from the link.
- **UITextItemInteraction.preview**: The user wants to get a preview of the content represented by the text item, such as by initiating a peek and pop on a link.
